catalog_info.title: Laboratory Research
catalog_info.notes: Ryan W. Draft and members of the Department
catalog_info.description: This course is taken to obtain credit for independent laboratory research during the 6th, 7th, or 8th semester. Research work should be directed by a member of the Neurobiology concentration standing committee or an appropriate Harvard affiliated faculty member in another department or institution. All students must submit registration materials for Neurobiology 98r at the time of enrollment.
